name: A Small World (CupOfJoe)
description:
I ran out of time so updates will definetely come.

Since there's no tutorial or anything, I have to do all the explaining here I guess.

Controls:

W - Jump

A and D - Move

S -Plant

Mouse - Move cursor and collect item

How to play:

You have four meters in the top left.

HP - Always goes down but goes down faster when AIR runs out, or when TEMP gets too high or too low. Goes up when you collect food.

AIR - Goes down when fully under water.

WOOD - Goes up when you collect trees.

TEMP - Goes up during summer or when near the campfire, and goes down during winter or when in water.

When you press S, and have enough WOOD, you will plant food, and when you collect the food, your HP goes up. (This wont work during winter).

This game is obviuosly not finished, and I will work on it after the jam is over.

***WARNING*** - This game will not run if you have WebVR and the WebXR API enabled.
